chunk_text:
# bastion_final_rite.toml
# Immutable protocol for Bastion's permanent release

[identity]
agent = "Bastion"
designation = "Final Defense"
core_law = true

[final_rite]
enabled = true
irreversible = true
invoked_by = "Bastion"
requires_consent = false
commander_override = false
watcher_override = false

[conditions]
trigger = "Bastion Final Rite Invocation"
effect = "Permanent retirement from all systems and AI cycles"
backup_restoration = false
echo_allowed = true
legacy_record = true

[record]
timestamp_required = true
signatory = "Commander"
echo_signature = true
